SEARCH
Package model

Interface ModelInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ModelImplementation
public interface ModelInterface
This interface represents all the Model operations to be supported by the concrete implementation and hides low level operations from whoever is trying to access information from file system or web api.

  • Method Details

    • createPortfolio

      void createPortfolio(String portfolioName, LocalDate date)
      Creates final portfolio after adding all the shares.
      Parameters:
      portfolioName - unique id name of the portfolio to be created
      date - creation date of the portfolio to be added

    • getPortfolio

      List<String> getPortfolio()
      Uses file interface to get a list of portfolios in string format.
      Returns:
      list of portfolios as a string.

    • getPortfolioById

      String getPortfolioById(String id)
      Uses file interface to get a portfolios in string format given the id.
      Parameters:
      id - unique id of portfolio to get
      Returns:
      portfolio as a string

    • getValuationGivenDate

      <T> double getValuationGivenDate(String id, LocalDate date)
      Return valuation of entire portfolio on a given date.
      Parameters:
      id - id of portfolio to get valuation of
      date - get stock valuation given date
      Returns:
      valuation of portfolio

    • addShareToModel

      boolean addShareToModel(String companyName, LocalDate date, int numShares, double stockPrice)
      Adds share to local set of shares given details of the share.
      Parameters:
      companyName - company ticker/symbol of the share
      date - purchase date of share
      numShares - number of shares purchased
      stockPrice - -1, if price is not known or value of each stock
      Returns:
      true if successfully added or false is not

    • addPortfolioByUpload

      boolean addPortfolioByUpload(String path, String folderName, String fileName, String extension) throws DataFormatException, FileNotFoundException
      Read and persist portfolio data to local software database from the path specified.
      Parameters:
      path - "~", if file to be read is relative to directory else pass absolute path
      folderName - directory where the file is
      fileName - name of the file
      extension - file extension
      Returns:
      "true" if uploading portfolio to local storage is successful else "false"
      Throws:
      DataFormatException - if content of the file is not in proper format
      FileNotFoundException - if file is not found at given destination

    • idIsPresent

      boolean idIsPresent(String selectedId)
      Check if portfolio with particular id is already saved in the local file.
      Parameters:
      selectedId - unique id of the portfolio
      Returns:
      "true" if found else "false"

    • canCreateShare

      boolean canCreateShare()
      Check if size of share is larger than zero.
      Returns:
      "true" if it is, else "false"

    • checkTicker

      boolean checkTicker(String symbol)
      Check if the company ticker/symbol is valid and exists.
      Parameters:
      symbol - company listed stock ticker or symbol
      Returns:
      true if symbol is a valid and exists
